text: Suzanne Casale Melone (n√©e Casale; born March 1, 1979), better known by her stage name Lil Suzy, is an American freestyle/pop singer who was mainly active in the 1990s. Lil Suzy is best known for the singles "Take Me in Your Arms", "Promise Me", and "Can't Get You Out of My Mind". Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New York City
title: Lil Suzy
